title: David Allan Coe - "Underground Album" & "Nothing Sacred
description:
I purchased both of these CDs from www.officialdavidallancoe.com and I'd like to make a few comments to anyone who considers doing the same.

I paid a total of $36 for these discs ($15 per disc + $6 shipping) and waited nearly a month for them to arrive. I'm all for supporting the artist, but this is highway robbery. Each disc runs only 30 minutes so all 20 songs could easily be put onto a single disc. To make matters worse, the above website also sells a compilation disc with 18 tracks, which means that the only way to get all 20 songs is to buy the discs separately.

The above website also states that these recordings are from the "master tapes" but they sound to me like they were simply transferred from old LPs. 

In addition, the discs themselves are not actually silver CDs but CDRs and the so-called artwork is nothing more than photocopies - and not good photocopies on decent paper either. 

For the above reasons, I'm happy to share both albums in lossless FLAC format and hopefully save a few people $36!


David Allan Coe
Underground Album

102. Panheads Forever
103. Nigger Fucker
104. Coffee

David Allan Coe
Nothing Sacred
